titles.title: PRO-HEAL Act of 2024
PRO-HEAL Act of 2024
Providing Resources and Opportunities for Health Education And Learning Act of 2024
A bill to authorize the Administrator of the Health Resources and Services Administration to award grants to expand or create health care provider pipeline programs.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
